text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haaaa! A good morning to you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: How did you spend your day off!? I helped keep the peace downtown with Ms. Biko!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: We picked up trash, patrolled…… And even did a hero show in the park!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What do you think? As class president and honor student, I've had quite the wonderful and fulfilling holiday!
In her own way, Sakura Bakushin O seems to have……enjoyed her holiday!
